txt.en:
'Now that the leaves are sorted, the next step is to dry them. The longer the pipe-weed dries, the stronger the taste becomes. It also darkens the colour of the smoke.

'Once it's dried, we'll blend different amounts of dried and fresh pipe-weed to make some unique flavours. That's how you get the best out of the plant.

'The drying racks are just around the corner to the north-east, and there's already some pipe-weed on it. Add what you've sorted to the racks.'
'Good, now comes the best part. Time for samples!'
'We won't dry all of it all the way, but it needs to be out there for at least a day or two.'
Pipe-weed is something hobbits take very seriously. A market would never be visited unless it had a suitable supply and variety.
Placed the pipe-weed on the drying racks ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Place the pipe-weed on the drying racks ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The drying racks are north-east of Blossom Gamgee on Northcotton Farm.\n\nThe sorted pipe-weed needs to be placed on the drying racks.
Blossom Gamgee is on Northcotton Farm.\n\nBlossom Gamgee will want to know the pipe-weed has been placed on the drying racks.
